name: Stir-Fried Pork In Garlic Sauce
keywords: boneless pork shoulder, garlic, soy sauce, dairy-free, fall, spring, summer, winter, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds boneless pork, preferably from the shoulder (Boston butt or picnic), sliced thinly and dried
1 bunch scallions, cut into 2-inch lengths, white and green parts separated

recipeInstructions.text: Put oil in a large nonstick skillet or wok, and turn heat to high; a minute later add garlic and chilies, and cook, stirring occasionally, until garlic begins to color.
Add pork and cook, stirring once or twice, until it begins to brown, about 2 minutes. Add white parts of scallions, and stir; cook another minute, stirring occasionally.
Stir in green parts of scallions; cook for 30 seconds, then turn off heat and add soy sauce. Serve immediately, with white rice.
